body: As a celebration on my promotion to junior mod. I decided to host an AMA. Ask away my friends <3
body_tagged: As a celebration on my promotion to junior mod. I decided to host an AMA. Ask away my friends <3
title: {AMA} Acceqted

replies.body: Do you think you deserve Jr.Mod? If so, why.
replies.body_tagged: Do you think you deserve Jr.Mod? If so, why.

replies.body:
If you could be a minecraft mob, which one would you be? And why?
If you could be a minecraft block or item, which one would you choose to be? Why?
replies.body_tagged:
If you could be a minecraft mob, which one would you be? And why?
If you could be a minecraft block or item, which one would you choose to be? Why?

replies.body:
I don't want to sound really self absorbed. But I think I deserve Jr. Mod because of my maturity. I may not be the oldest staff member but maturity can take someone really far when it comes to online games. 


P.S. Good luck to everyone who applied.

Minecraft mob: Skeleton (I love the bow)
Minecraft Block: Glowstone (The light to everyone's dark place)

replies.body:
Favourite holiday tradition?
Best song you've ever heard?
Places you want to travel?
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Tradition; Opening presents <3
Best song; Hello by Adele, Take me to church
Places I want to travel; Hopefully somewhere we could meet irl. I'll buy the Starbucks :P

replies.body: What do you want to be when your older?And why???
replies.body_tagged: What do you want to be when your older?And why???

replies.body:
I wanted to become staff member because I really thought I belonged there. I thought I could fit in and bring another voice into the staff team.

Well... My trial had not ended so I can't really say anything else, but I guess they just need more time to think =P.

Neon Green
Pizza
Hawaii
Dance
Vice, Ethan... And Nathy.

What do I want to do when in older: Side job: Become an MC for events.
Main Job: Choreographer / Teacher
